text: Kim Sung-Gan (Hangul:김성간, November 17, 1912 - May 19, 1984) was a South Korean athlete. He is best known as an association football player. He was a member of the Japan national team in 1940.JapanNationalFootballTeam.com, Japan National Football Team Database; retrieved 2012-9-4. ==International career statistics== |- |1940||1||0 |- !Total||1||0 |} ==References== ==Other websites== * * Japan Football Association * Japan National Football Team Database Category:1912 births Category:1984 deaths Category:People from Pyongyang Category:Japanese footballers Category:South Korean footballers Category:Japan international footballers
title: Kim Sung-gan
